name: "Hear Me — Let Us Raise the Chalice of Love!"
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Furina, equip this card.
After Furina equips this card, immediately use Salon Solitaire once.
When Furina, who has this card equipped, uses Salon Solitaire, she will apply Center of Attention to herself. (Normal Attack will trigger different effects depending on state)
(You must have Furina in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1211]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1211] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S12112]</color> once.
When $[A1211], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S12123]</color>, she will apply <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1030]</color> to herself. (Normal Attack will trigger different effects depending on state)
(You must have $[A1211] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Furina</color>, equip this card.
After Furina equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Salon Solitaire</color> once.
When Furina, who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Salon Solitaire</color>, she will apply <color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Center of Attention</color></color> to herself. (Normal Attack will trigger different effects depending on state)
(You must have Furina in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytitle: Furina: Hear Me — Let Us Raise the Chalice of Love!
source: Reward for inviting Furina to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
